name: Veggie And Cheese Breakfast In A Mug 🥩
description: This recipe is healthy and nourishing breakfast option that can be made in just a few minutes, this veggie and cheese breakfast in a mug is the perfect way to start your day!
instructions: In a bowl, add egg, milk, cheese, salt, and pepper, and mix.
In a microwave-safe mug, place half of the cubed bread and desired amount of spinach and red pepper.
Place the rest of the bread and fixins and pour the egg mixture into the mug.
Microwave for 1½ minutes or until egg is fully cooked.
Sprinkle with some tomatoes, if desired.
